alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 4:41PM PDT until further notice by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The high desert of San Bernardino County west of Victorville and Adelanto in the El Mirage Valley. * WHEN...Until 600 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding on Highway 18, El Mirage Road and Sheep Creek Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 441 PM PDT, Radar estimated rainfall indicated 1 to 2 inches of rain near the town of El Mirage, about 10 miles west of Adelanto. Flooding in this area is likely. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... El Mirage, western Adelanto, Phelan and Pinon Hills. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
